schema.description: Object that describes the model stored in the 'model' parameter, including its schema, framework, and version.

schema_uri.description: URI of a JSON schema document.

model.description: JSON representation of a model. This should contain everything needed to fully run the model, including all rates/initial parameters/distributions/etc.

properties.description: (Optional) Information about the model that may be used during modification or execution of the model.

metadata.description: (Optional) Information not useful for execution of the model, but that may be useful to some consumer in the future. E.g. creation timestamp or source paper's author.
